job.title: BESCOM Graduate & Diploma Apprentice Recruitment 2021 – Apply Online for 400 Vacancies in Bangalore
job.body:
Total vacancies:400

Name of the Vacancies:

  • Graduate Apprentice & Technician (Diploma)

Description

Latest Central Government Jobs for Graduation has been published by department full form for Graduate Apprentice & Technician (Diploma) vacancies in Bangalore. If you are searching for a government job in Bangalore then it is an opportunity for you. You can fill the online application for the vacancies of Graduate Apprentice & Technician (Diploma), from 15-07-2021, and till 30-07-2021. If you are interested in all these vacancies in Bangalore and if eligible, please check out the details given below, which have been given age limit, educational qualification pay scale, etc.

Application fee:

  • The mode of application is Online
  • No information about application fee

Educational qualification:

  • To apply for a Graduate Apprentice & Technician (Diploma) in BESCOM, your Graduation must be completed from a recognized University

Important dates:

  •  The starting date to apply in these posts is 15-07-2021
  •  The last date to apply in these posts is 30-07-2021

Age Limit Criteria:

  • For General Candidate, you should be between 21 to 35 years old. 

BESCOM Graduate Apprentice & Technician (Diploma) Pay Scale:

  • According to the information given by the Central Government and as per the 7th pay commission, the teacher's monthly salary is as per norms

How to apply for BESCOM Graduate & Diploma Apprentice Recruitment 2021?

Press the Apply Now button above. You can directly and easily start the application process of the Graduate Apprentice & Technician (Diploma) Fill in your details and submit it or follow all the steps given below.

  •  First, go to the official website of BESCOM  and register yourself on the portal.
  • Find the notification, log in and then provide the details and documents asked by BESCOM 
  • Then save it and complete the application submission.
  • Then to fully complete the process you have to submit the application fee.
  • And finally, download the application form for future purposes.

Download Official notification pdf.
